This is a [link](https://www.google.com/) to a good data science tool. Here is a link to [p8105](https://p8105.com/). Here's a link to the [about](about.html) page



you can still use R

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = runif(100),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
